project_descr: Support to Acceleration of the MDG Achievement in Indonesia

outputs.output_descr: Output 2:  National and  sub National capacities are improved to monitor, evaluate, analyze and report on MDG and human development
donor_name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade of the Republic of korea

outputs.output_descr: Output 1: Strategy and mechanisms to implement the MDG Roadmap are developed at the national and sub-national level

Support to the acceleration of MDG Achievement in Indonesia - with expected outputs:
(1) Strategy and mechanisms to implement the MDG Roadmap are developed
(2) National and sub-national capacities improved to monitor, evaluate, analyse and report on MDGs and human development
(3) Project Document on Support to the Acceleration of MDG Achievement in Indonesia Finalised
